verses.name: Job 7:10
verses.text: He shall return no more to his house, neither shall his place know him any more.

verses.name: Job 7:11
verses.text: Therefore I will not refrain my mouth; I will speak in the anguish of my spirit; I will complain in the bitterness of my soul.

verses.name: Job 7:12
verses.text: Am I a sea, or a whale, that thou settest a watch over me?

verses.name: Job 7:13
verses.text: When I say, My bed shall comfort me, my couch shall ease my complaint;

verses.name: Job 7:14
verses.text: Then thou scarest me with dreams, and terrifiest me through visions:

verses.name: Job 7:15
verses.text: So that my soul chooseth strangling, and death rather than my life.
